about_the_game:
MoonWool is an Adventure and Sheep Herding Game in a Cartoon universe. You embody a space Shepherd leading a large herd of sheeps on your mini farm planet.

Unfortunately, a huge cosmic tempest hit your galaxy and just took away your little sheeps across it.

Proud shepherd that you are! You will have to find and bring back your sheeps braving danger of the whole little planets of the galaxy.

Your shepherd companion will be of great help to you during this trying adventure! he knows fauna and flora of that galaxy like his pocket! he will also open nano portals to allow you to evacuate your sheeps to your farm planet.

Move the shepherd with a mouse and lead your sheep by moving next to them! Be careful of the night, and maybe you will be able to get through the 55 planets of the game!

Features :
- A herd management game that combines dexterity and knowledge of the environment.
- Super cute sheeps! There are several types of sheep with different behaviors.
- Colorful mini planets with very distinct biomes to explore!
- Day/Night system dictating your actions! Indeed, the fauna and flora of the mini planets that you will explore will have regularly different behaviors if they are in day or night side.
